channel.title: emotion on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in emotion on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: "What's your deal with Roger Federer?"
item.description: Roger Federerjust won his 7th Wimbledon Championship lifting him back to his rightful place as World No. 1. He is the greatest Tennis player of all time.

item.title: Anger
item.description: First published in August 2008 Anger. Like a vengeful human on a leash If you were to be freed What damage, what destruction… What chaos.

item.title: Android body vs Human body
item.description: A lot of futuristic science fiction puts forward several ideas of what an android would be like. Data from Star Trek (TNG) is an intriguing character who tries very hard to understand what it is to be human.

item.title: Types of Love: An Analysis.
item.description: It is perhaps important to differentiate the various meaning that we refer to when we say the word love. Often ‘love’ is used in the place of a more suitable word.
